# 2008 New York Film Critics Circle Awards

74th NYFCC Awards
January 5, 2009
----
Best Picture:
Milk
The 74th New York Film Critics Circle Awards, honoring the best in film for 2008, were announced on 10 December 2008 and presented on 5 January 2009.
